Sample Diet Chart
--------------------
 --> Breakfast at 8.30 am: 1 apple or 1 bowl of watermelon and 2 glasses of water.
 --> Brunch at 10.30 am: 1 cup of diced pineapples, 1 apple and 2 glasses of water.
 --> Lunch at 1 noon: 1 bowl of mixed cabbage, onions, cucumber, broccoli, carrots with 2 glasses of water.
 --> Afternoon Snack at 4.00 pm: 1/2 grapefruit and a glass of water.
 --> Evening Snack at 6.30 pm: 1 guava or 1 pear.
 -->Dinner at 8.00 pm: 1 bowl of boiled broccoli, 1/2 cup boiled beet and 2 glasses of water.
